Padding 0 (no padding)
Padding 4 (1rem padding on all sides)
Padding X-8 Y-2 (2rem horizontal, 0.5rem vertical padding)
Padding Left-10 Right-4 (2.5rem left, 1rem right padding)
Padding Top-6 Bottom-3 (1.5rem top, 0.75rem bottom padding)
Background Color (bg-blue-500)
Background Gradient (bg-gradient-to-r from-green-400 to-blue-500)
Background Image (bg-cover, bg-center)
Background Color with Opacity (bg-purple-500 bg-opacity-70)
Background Clip Text (bg-clip-text text-transparent)

Welcome to Our School

Empowering students with quality education and a wide range of extracurricular activities.

Learn More

About Us

Our school is committed to providing a balanced education that fosters intellectual, physical, and emotional growth. We value diversity and encourage students to reach their highest potential.

Our Activities

Sports

We offer a wide variety of sports activities including football, basketball, and track & field to help students stay fit and healthy.

Arts & Crafts

Our arts and crafts classes inspire creativity and self-expression in students through drawing, painting, and sculpture.

Science Club

The Science Club encourages curiosity, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills with hands-on experiments and projects.
